title: Can anyone with unlimited bandwidth test a fresh install for me?
body:
I want to know 2 things:

1) Size of the folder ("Size on disk:" when you click the properties button).

2) Does the following directory exist, or has it been removed?

\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\\deploy

replies.body:
I reached out to our tech team for the exacts for you! So it will be 8-12 gigs, but 8 on a fresh reinstall. 
The directory shouldn't since it's the legacy, but since we're still using the legacy client and updating it then it probably still does exist.

Anyone? Please? lol.

Reinstalling League from scratch to test this would use 1/10th of my monthly allowance.
